    World

    A physics world is a collection of bodies, fixtures, and constraints that interact together. More...

    Import Statement: import Bacon2D 1.0
    • List of all members, including inherited members

    Properties

    • gravity : QPointF
    • pixelsPerMeter : float
    • running : bool

    Methods

    • void rayCast(RayCast ray, QPointF point1, QPointF point2)

    Detailed Description

    Scene {
    width: 300
    height: 150
    World {
        id: world
        anchors.fill: parent
    }
}

    Property Documentation

    gravity : QPointF

    This property holds the global gravity vector.


    pixelsPerMeter : float

    This property holds the number of pixels per meter.

    The physics world uses meters to measure velocity, movement, etc.


    running : bool

    This property represents the current running state of the World

    void rayCast(RayCast ray, QPointF point1, QPointF point2)
